article_title: Stray cat on the loose at Dallas Love Field
article_text:
A stray cat has made its home at Dallas Love Field and has been there for about a week.

An airport spokesman said they are trying to catch the furry visitor with traps and cat food, but he just keeps running away.

Once they catch the cat, one of the airport employees plans to adopt him.
